You are seeing the preliminary web version of this master's thesis.

The analyses contained in this document are 100% reproducible. They were performed using the [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) and the [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) publishing system (an evolution of [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/)). Click on the GitHub icon in the menu to access the thesis code repository.
